name: Holly M Christenson
body:
# [About](/index) | [Research Interests](/research) | [CV](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1biGWrhOzvlytGJqY2xoWUhRH-7N5KzZP/view?usp=sharing)

![hello!](/assets/hello.jpeg)


 I am a second year graduate student at UC Riverside. I expect to graduate in 2022 with a PhD in Physics. My research interests include reionization, high redshift galaxies and the intergalactic medium.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
